title: Paul Gosar
summary: Paul Anthony Gosar (/ˈɡoʊsɑːr/ GOH-sarr; born November 27, 1958) is an American far-right[3] politician and former dentist who has served as the U.S. representative for Arizona's 4th congressional district since 2013. A Republican, he was elected in 2010 to represent the neighboring 1st congressional district until redistricting. Gosar's support of conspiracy theories[4][5] and alleged ties to the Proud Boys and Oath Keepers have stirred controversy.[6]
